content: Yes, with streaming services like Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Hulu, viewers have the convenience of picking up a show right where they left off, even if it's been a while since they last watched it. This feature is beneficial, especially for those who are busy and may not have the time to watch an entire series in one sitting. Additionally, most streaming services also offer personalized recommendations based on past viewing history, which makes it easier for viewers to discover new shows that they might like. This convenience has been a game-changer for many viewers who can now easily manage their viewing time and preferences with ease.
